TopicTitle: Ultimate docking, mun landing, exploration challenge

Articles.Content:
I came up with a ultimate challenge that would give much fame to those who succeed! I\'m talking about building a space station, docking a ship to it, taking that ship to the mun with a other ship, explore the mun, return safely!

So steps:

1.Make a space station

2. Put it in orbit

3. Make a ship with a moon rover on it

4. Dock that into the space station using landing struts

5. Make another ship able to tow the other ship

6. Go to orbit and tow the ship with moon rover in it to the Mun

7. Return to Kerbin leaving the moon rover to the Mun

8. Gongratulations! You have established a space station, made a Mun station with a moon rover and gained international Kerbin fame!

Rules:

1. You may use any mod that adds ship parts

2. No auto-orbit or auto-pilot

3. Make a video or take screenshots of your journey

4. You must have fun!

I\'m eagerly waiting for your submissions!
I don\'t think this is possible. Docking with landing struts is unstable and puts you into un uncontrollable spin, so after step 4, you can\'t do much more.
Getting any fun from this without using auto-pilot? 4th rule of this challenge (which is numbered 3rd, by the way) multiplies difficulty by 9000.

Getting any fun from this without using auto-pilot? 4th rule of this challenge (which is numbered 3rd, by the way) multiplies difficulty by 9000.

If you need to use the auto-pilot to have fun... then you, sir, are doing it wrong.
